reviewText: this is SO well done! narrated in Russian with English subtitles that sometimes run very fast, so this cannot be watched leisurely; you must read quickly, but it never failed to hold my attention; this is really the history of Russia for 400+ years! a top notch production; well-filmed; actors actually looked liked those persons whom they portrayed
Expand ur brain and learn, great documentary to start with
Historical documentary which is well done
